subject: Communication
title: Source Evaluation: The SIFT Method
description: A micro-lesson that makes Source Evaluation: The SIFT Method usable.

hook.text: A professional-looking website claims a miracle cure. Before you believe it, SIFT: Stop, Investigate, Find, Trace.

buildup.text: Mike Caulfield's SIFT method: Stop (pause before sharing), Investigate the source, Find better coverage, Trace claims.

discovery.text: Most misinformation succeeds because people react before investigating.

twist.text: Website design and professional appearance have zero correlation with accuracy.

climax.text: SIFT takes less than 60 seconds and catches most misinformation.

punchline.text: Before you share, SIFT. Sixty seconds can save you from spreading a lie.
